9 February 2018
Ascometal® joining SCHMOLZ+BICKENBACH Group
Ascometal® is since February 1st 2018 part of the SCHMOLZ+BICKENBACH Group If you wish to know more about the group, please visit http://www.schmolz-bickenbach.com/en/

12 January 2016
Asco Industries will exhibit at Wire 2016
From April 4th to 8th, Hall 15, stand J32, Asco Industries, with Ascometal GmbH, will be present at the Wire exhibition of Düsseldorf, Germany.
